## Overview

A horizontal rule

## Usage

### Example

```tsx
export default () => (
    <es-sidebar>
        <es-layout-section>
            <es-layout-link url={'/'}>{'Some link'}</es-layout-link>
        </es-layout-section>
        <es-layout-hr />
        <es-layout-section>
            <es-layout-link url={'/go'}>{'Some link'}</es-layout-link>
        </es-layout-section>
    </es-sidebar>
);
```
